body:
Here is a categorized list of the commits:
* preparation (https://github.com/sipa/bitcoin/compare/8c1e49ba13a88917e133c28d35b665967d4c90b0...09cf4a8)
  * 02d7f65 Keep addrman's nService bits consistent with outbound observations
  * fd820ff Verify that outbound connections have expected services
  * 611508d Only store and connect to NODE_NETWORK nodes
* segnet (https://github.com/sipa/bitcoin/compare/09cf4a8...90d4a39)
  * 523a735 Don't check the genesis block PoW
  * 844318d Create segnet4
  * cc346ea Add segnet seed nodes
* P2P/node/consensus (https://github.com/sipa/bitcoin/compare/90d4a39...80fbae8)
  * e6c8869 Add segregated witness transaction serialization
  * fbac2fe Rework Cinv::GetCommand
  * 492f4b7 Introduce and preferentially peer with NODE_WITNESS service bit
  * a56b3e0 Witness commitment validation
  * a563dbe Script validation logic for witnesses
  * 2e38b58 Enable SCRIPT_VERIFY_WITNESS for mempool transactions
  * 16386df Activate script consensus rules through BIP9
  * 59929c5 Only download blocks from witness peers after fork
  * f8fd6e6 Observe input amounts: verification
  * 9b03b6b Add signature versions and updated sighash inside witnesses
  * 0c24736 Return witness data
  * 78ebb47 Implement block size/sigop cost rules, limits, and GBT support
  * acaf9d2 bitcoinconsensus: add method that accepts amount, and return error when verify_script receives VERIFY_WITNESS flag
  * 2ae9c43 Add rewind logic to deal with post-fork software updates
* wallet (https://github.com/sipa/bitcoin/compare/80fbae8...c428a83)
  * 9b6d078 Witness script signing
  * cef80e1 Add witness address RPCs (using P2SH)
  * 880ce3a signrawtransaction can sign P2WSH
* tests (https://github.com/sipa/bitcoin/compare/c428a83...b3ba119)
  * af91204 Signing tests
  * 47bee90 Add transaction tests for segwit
  * 0230956 Add segwit support to script_tests
  * 4f03989 Autogeneration support for witness in script_tests
  * 9b7d08b Add rpc test for segwit
  * 9f4ff1a p2p segwit tests
  * 5fd80ec Segwit script error unit tests
  * 0a655db script_tests: witness tests can specify tx amount
  * e76c2a3 Add GetTransactionSigOpCost unit tests
* deployment (https://github.com/sipa/bitcoin/compare/b3ba119...fc772e4)
  * 0a0f86e BIP9 parameters for testnet
* commentary (https://github.com/sipa/bitcoin/compare/fc772e4...17389dc466f2acf8bfa64ce0416f3b5281445a5c)
  * 17389dc Commentary
